hasMenuItem.name: Customize Your Own Pizza (17")
hasMenuItem.description: Begin with a 17" cheese pizza featuring our signature pizza sauce. Customize by adding your preferred toppings.

hasMenuItem.name: Customize Your Own Pizza (10")
hasMenuItem.description: Start with a 10" pizza base, adding tomato sauce and a blend of cheeses, then customize with your choice of toppings to create your ideal pizza.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Diavola
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza featuring Diavola on one half and choice of classics like Margherita or unique combinations such as Pros e Rucolo on the other.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Mangiacake
hasMenuItem.description: 17" half & half pizza featuring a selection from over twenty options including classic margherita, seafood-rich pescatore, spicy diavola, and vegetariano. Choose your ideal pairing.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Salumeria
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza, half Salumeria with choice of one: Margherita to Pros e Rucolo, including vegetarian options and classic Italian flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Margherita
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza combining classic Margherita with choice of unique half like prosciutto & funghi, diavola, or vegetariano among others. Explore flavors from marinara to siciliana.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Prosciutto & Funghi
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza combining prosciutto and funghi with a choice of diverse flavors, including classic Margherita, seafood-rich Pescatore, and spicy Diavola among others.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Spaccanapoli
hasMenuItem.description: 17" half-and-half pizza; choose among classics like Margherita or unique combos like Pros e Rucolo. Options include seafood, meats, vegetarian, and four cheese varieties.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Pescatore
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza with one side Pescatore - choice of second half from Margherita, Marinara, various regional toppings, assorted cheeses, or vegetarian options.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Quattro Stagioni
hasMenuItem.description: 17" half Quattro Stagioni, choice of second half from options like Margherita, Diavola, or Vegetariano among others. Traditional Italian toppings.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Vegetariano
hasMenuItem.description: Half & half 17" Italian pizza with one side vegetariano. Choose the other half from options including classics like margherita and specialities like prosciutto & funghi or spicy arrabiata.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Pepperonata
hasMenuItem.description: Half Pepperonata paired with choice of any from Margherita to Pros e Rucolo. Includes classics & specialties like Quattro Formaggi, Diavola.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Cacciatore
hasMenuItem.description: Half cacciatore paired with a choice from a variety including traditional margherita, seafood-rich pescatore, spicy diavola, or vegetarian options. Selection spans classic to specialty flavors, 17" size.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Capricciosa
hasMenuItem.description: Capricciosa paired with choice of one: traditional favorites like Margherita, spicy Diavola, seafood-rich Pescatore, or the creamy Quattro Formaggi among diverse half pizza options.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Primavera
hasMenuItem.description: Half Primavera paired with choice of signature pizzas like Quattro Formaggi, Margherita Originale, or Diavola. Traditional toppings, 17" size. Variety of flavors for every taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Ragazzi
hasMenuItem.description: Half & Half Pizza (17") - "Half Ragazzi": Select two from options like Margherita, Diavola, Quattro Formaggi, and more for a custom 17" pizza creation. Includes both traditional & unique combinations.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Arrabiata
hasMenuItem.description: 17" half arrabiata pizza paired with choices like margherita, cheese, or vegetariano, among other traditional flavors. Choose from a wide selection, including seafood and prosciutto options.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Margherita Originale
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza combining classic Margherita with choice of various Italian flavors including seafood, meats, cheeses, and vegetables. Select from 21 diverse options for the second half.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Cheese Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza with one side cheese. Choose from options like Margherita, Marinara, to specialities like Quattro Formaggi and Siciliana.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Pros e Rucolo
hasMenuItem.description: Half Pros e Rucolo Pizza, featuring a choice of various toppings including classics and signature selections like Diavola, Quattro Stagioni, and Margherita Originale.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Rustica
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza featuring Rustica on one half. Choose companion half: varieties include Margherita to Pros e Rucolo - meats, cheeses, seafood, vegetarian options.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Quattro Formaggi
hasMenuItem.description: 17" Quattro Formaggi on one side with choice of other half from options like Margherita, Diavola, or Vegetariano among others.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Siciliana
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza half topped with Siciliana. Choose your other half from options like Margherita, Four Cheese, or Seafood among others.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Napoletana
hasMenuItem.description: 17" pizza combining Napoletana with choice from varied options including classics & specialty flavors like Diavola, Vegetariano, or Pros e Rucolo.

hasMenuItem.name: Half Marinara
hasMenuItem.description: 17" half pizza combining Marinara with a choice of over 20 options including classics like Margherita and unique blends like Pros e Rucolo.

review.reviewBody: The pizza was amazing. The first order this one and it was deliciously hot. The dasher was very nice!!!!

This is my new favorite pizza place. Everything is so fresh and the pizza dough is delicious. 
I also really love the focaccia. Everything was incredible!!! The sauce is tangy and perfect. Will be eating here again.

While the pizza arrived hot, and was decent, it was jammed into a box too small for it and 2 pieces were folded almost in half. Since it has tomato slices it's a wet pizza, and when it pressed and folded to fit a bix too small for it, it becomes a mess. If I ever choose to order again, I'll choose a smaller pie.

Pizza not cooked in the middle. I had to put it it in the oven. I had to call dasher to ensure that they delivered the pizza to my apartment and not drop it off on the ground outside. It looked like they were leaving. The driver was nice.
Best pizza in town! By far!
